description: Ms. codex. Caption title from leaf 224b. Physical description: 20-21 lines per page; written in small naskh in black by two hands on glazed, laid European paper. Kitāb al-ṭahārah is rubricated; spaces left for rubrication in Kitāb al-ṣalāh are not filled in. Catchwords and marginal notes. Kitāb al-ṣalāh is bound before Kitāb al-ṭahārah. Occasional staining, last leaf detached. Origin: Kitāb al-ṭahārah, Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1255 H [February 1840], by Muḥammad Yūsuf al-Riḍawī al-Kāshānī (leaf 411a); Kitāb al-ṣalāh, 23 Rabīʻ I 1241 H [5 November 1825], by ʻAlī Akbar ibn Muḥammad Ḥusayn al-Kāshānī (leaf 222b). Incipit (leaf 224b): الحمد لله ... کتاب الطهارة و ارکانه اربعة الاول في المياه
author: Ṭabāṭabāʼī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, 1748-approximately 1816
abstract: Part of a commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's al-Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ, comprising Kitāb al-ṭahārah (leaves 224b-411a) through Kitāb al-ṣalāh (leaves 1b-222b).
extent: 411 leaves : paper ; 209 x 147 (146 x 94) mm bound to 210 x 148 mm
title: Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ kabīr
uniform_title: رياض المسائل في تحقيق الاحكام بالدلائل. مجلد 1
creator: طباطبائي، علي بن محمد، 1748-approximately 1816
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ.
binding_note: Full black leather; back cover detached.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
